meanings.definition: Resembling a fan in shape or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The palm tree had fanlike leaves that swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The peacock's tail feathers spread out in a fanlike display.
meanings.sent3: The fanlike pattern on the cake made it look too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her fanlike gestures while dancing added grace to her performance.
meanings.sent5: The fanlike clouds in the sky created a stunning sunset.

meanings.definition: Having a shape or structure similar to a fan.
meanings.sent1: The building had a fanlike roof that provided shade for the outdoor seating area.
meanings.sent2: The fanlike design of the air vent helped circulate cool air throughout the room.
meanings.sent3: The fanlike pattern on the rug gave the room a unique and modern look.
meanings.sent4: Her hair fell in a fanlike cascade down her back.
meanings.sent5: The fanlike arrangement of the cards on the table made it easy to see them all at once.

meanings.sent1: The fanlike structure of the building allowed for natural light to fill the room.
meanings.sent2: The fanlike petals of the flower opened up to reveal its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The fanlike design of the dress made it stand out at the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The fanlike spread of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The fanlike shape of the coral reef provided shelter for many sea creatures.
